Zone Spin Event Types¶

S4CLZoneEarlyLoadEvent¶

class S4CLZoneEarlyLoadEvent(zone: zone.Zone, game_loaded: bool = False, game_loading: bool = False)¶

Bases: sims4communitylib.events.event_handling.common_event.CommonEvent

An Event that Occurs upon early load of a zone.

property game_loaded¶

Determine if the game has loaded.

property game_loading¶

Determine if the game is loading.

property zone¶

The zone being loaded.

S4CLZoneLateLoadEvent¶

class S4CLZoneLateLoadEvent(zone: zone.Zone, household_id: int, active_sim_id: int, game_loaded: bool = False, game_loading: bool = False)¶

Bases: sims4communitylib.events.event_handling.common_event.CommonEvent

An Event that Occurs upon late load of a zone.

property active_sim_id¶

The decimal identifier of the sim being loaded.

property game_loaded¶

Determine if the game has loaded.

property game_loading¶

Determine if the game is loading.

property household_id¶

The decimal identifier of the household being loaded.

property zone¶

The zone being loaded.

S4CLZoneSaveEvent¶

class S4CLZoneSaveEvent(zone: zone.Zone, save_slot_data: Any = None, game_loaded: bool = False, game_loading: bool = False)¶

Bases: sims4communitylib.events.event_handling.common_event.CommonEvent

An Event that Occurs upon zone save.

property game_loaded¶

Determine if the game has loaded.

property game_loading¶

Determine if the game is loading.

property save_slot_data¶

Data pertaining to the save slot.

property zone¶

The zone being saved.

S4CLZoneTeardownEvent¶

class S4CLZoneTeardownEvent(zone: zone.Zone, client: server.client.Client, game_loaded: bool = False, game_loading: bool = False)¶

Bases: sims4communitylib.events.event_handling.common_event.CommonEvent

An Event that Occurs upon zone teardown.

property client¶

A reference to the client.

property game_loaded¶

Determine if the game has loaded.

property game_loading¶

Determine if the game is loading.

property zone¶

The zone teardown is occurring on.
